lyrics.text:
Ko ‘eku ngāue eni
Ke u fai mo fakahā
‘A ‘ene mā’oni’oni
Mo e Folofola.

Pea u sīkaki kalanga
‘A e lea ‘ofa,
Ke mou vakai ki he Lami
‘A hotau ‘Otua.

‘Ofa ke u malanga ‘aki
‘A hono huafa,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē
Ko honau hūfanga.

Pea u faka’osi‘aki
‘A ‘eku mānava
‘I he’eku tangi, pehē
Vakai ki he Lami.

Pea ke ongo’i ia
Pea mo’ui ai
‘A māmani kotoa pē
Pea fai ma’u ai pē.
